name: The Shallow Knight
description:
This game was part of my course at university, a 2D platformer. You play as a knight on a mission to save the princess from the castle. This game is missing some context which will make more sense if I had text boxes or watching the animation its based of.

W, A, D to move and SPACE to attack.

this was the first time using unity / making a game but I think its a great effort non the less
